seo.title: FunTell - AI-Powered Content Experience Platform
seo.description: Turn any information into an AI-powered, multilingual content experience. Create structured content with conversational AI assistants, shared via links, QR codes, or embeds. No app needed.
seo.keywords: AI content platform, interactive content experience, multilingual AI assistant, QR code content, conversational AI, content management, knowledge base AI, digital experience platform, no-app experience, AI voice guide, content distribution, educational content, product information
seo.structured_description: AI-Powered Content Experience Platform — Create multilingual, interactive content with conversational AI assistants for products, education, venues, storytelling, and more
seo.audience: Products, Education, Venues, Events, Knowledge Bases, Print Media, Storytelling, Tourism, Retail, Food & Beverage

dashboard.manage_cards_description: Manage your projects, content, and access settings.
dashboard.confirm_delete_card_message: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.access_mode_cannot_change: Access mode cannot be changed after creation. This ensures billing and content structure consistency.
dashboard.digital_access_full_desc: Create a QR code that links directly to content. Perfect for link-in-bio, digital menus, or quick access.
dashboard.digital_mode_hint: Your QR code will link to a welcome page with your description, then visitors explore content. No card image is displayed.
dashboard.digital_no_image_desc: Digital access shows a welcome page with your description. The card image is not displayed to visitors.
dashboard.digital_description_hint: This description will be displayed on the welcome page when visitors scan your QR code.
dashboard.digital_no_image_hint: Card images are not displayed for digital access.
dashboard.digital_desc_not_displayed: For digital access, the card description is not displayed to visitors (overview page is skipped). You can still add internal notes here if needed.
dashboard.enter_qr_name: Enter a name for this QR code...
dashboard.content_mode_tooltip: Choose how your content will be displayed to visitors. This affects the mobile layout.
dashboard.mode_single_guidance: Best for: Single article, product detail, announcement. Create 1 content item that displays as full page.
dashboard.mode_list_guidance: Best for: Link-in-bio, resource lists, simple menus. Each content item displays as a list row.
dashboard.mode_grid_guidance: Best for: Photo galleries, product catalogs, portfolios. Items display in a 2-column grid layout.
dashboard.mode_cards_guidance: Best for: Featured items, articles, announcements. Each item displays as a full-width card with image and description.
dashboard.grouping_description: Group your content items under category headers. Parent items become categories, child items are listed under them.
dashboard.group_display_expanded_desc: Items shown directly under category headers on the same page
dashboard.group_display_collapsed_desc: Tap category to navigate and view items inside
dashboard.migrate_to_grouped_message: This will organize your existing content into categories. A default category will be created and all current items will be moved under it. You can then create more categories and drag items between them.
dashboard.migration_failed: Failed to organize content. Please try again.
dashboard.migrate_to_flat_message: This will flatten your content structure. All items will become top-level items and empty categories will be removed.
dashboard.flatten_failed: Failed to flatten content. Please try again.

how_it_works.title: Simple
how_it_works.subtitle: Launch your AI-powered content experience in minutes — just give AI your document and it handles the rest.

steps.create_desc: Give your document to an AI agent and it builds your project automatically — content, categories, and AI assistant included.
steps.share_desc: Share via link, QR code, or embed on your website or printed materials.
steps.engage_desc: Visitors explore your content and interact with your AI-powered assistant.

features.collectible_desc: Instant access via QR code. Share links, embed on websites, or print QR codes.
features.ai_guide_desc: Real-time conversations with context awareness and follow-up questions.
features.no_app_desc: Instant access via any smartphone camera. No downloads, no friction.
features.portal_config_desc: Import a document or describe your project — AI creates everything for you in seconds.
features.multilingual_desc: Content and conversations in 10+ languages from one upload.
features.no_hardware_desc: Uses visitors' own phones. No expensive equipment to buy or maintain.
features.dashboard_desc: Self-service platform for content management, analytics, and QR distribution.

pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you use. Start free, scale with your business.

session_info.title: How Session Billing Works
session_info.tracking_note: Each unique visitor scan counts as one session
session_info.auto_topup_desc: When budget runs out, US$${topupCost} is automatically charged for extra sessions

pricing.footer_text: Start free • Pay per session • Cancel anytime

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: FunTell is an AI-powered content experience platform that turns any document into an interactive, multilingual experience with built-in conversational AI. Import a PDF or describe your project — AI builds everything automatically. Share via links, QR codes, or embeds. No app required.
faq.a2:
1) Import your document or describe your project to an AI agent — it creates everything automatically
2) Share via link, QR code, or embed
3) Visitors access AI-powered, multilingual content instantly on any device
faq.q3: Do visitors need to download an app?
faq.a3: No. FunTell works through any smartphone browser. Simply scan the QR code—nothing to download or install.
faq.a4: Content and AI conversations are available in 10+ languages: English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Arabic, Spanish, French, Russian, and more.
faq.a5: Three tiers: Free ({freeExperiences} projects, {freeSessions} sessions), Starter ({starterBudget}/month, {starterAiSessions} AI sessions, max 2 languages), Premium ({monthlyBudget}/month, {aiSessions} AI sessions, unlimited languages, white label). Paid plans include auto top-up when budget runs out. All plans include AI voice, dashboard, QR codes, and hosting.
faq.q6: How quickly can we get started?
faq.a6: Projects can launch within minutes. Connect an AI tool like Claude Code, import your document, and AI builds your entire project automatically — content, categories, AI assistant, and QR codes.
faq.q7: Can we customize the content and AI?
faq.a7: Yes. Full customization using our self-service dashboard. Manage content, configure AI assistant behavior, set welcome messages, and update anytime.
faq.q8: How quickly are QR experiences available?
faq.a8: QR experiences are available instantly after creation. Create your project, add content, and share your QR code right away.
faq.a9: Free: {freeSessions} sessions/month, no translations. Starter: {starterBudget} budget, AI {starterAiCost}/session ({starterAiSessions} included), max 2 languages. Premium: {monthlyBudget} budget, AI {aiCost}/session ({aiSessions} included), unlimited languages. Auto top-up available for paid plans.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? Reach out via our Contact form.

footer.description: AI-powered content experience platform. Turn any information into interactive, multilingual experiences.

credits.title: Credit Management
credits.redirectingToPaymentDetail: You will be redirected to Stripe for secure payment

plan.title: Plan & Usage
plan.description: Manage your plan and track usage

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.voice_credits_description: Voice credits are used for AI voice conversations. Each call uses 1 credit. Purchase using your credit balance.
subscription.voice_credits_purchase_error: Failed to purchase voice credits. Please try again.
subscription.voice_credits_purchase_description: Purchase {count} voice credits for ${price} from your credit balance
subscription.voice_credits_confirm_question: Proceed with this voice credit purchase?
subscription.voice_insufficient_balance: Insufficient credit balance. Please purchase more credits first.

features.overage_available: Top-up available when budget runs out

usage.title: Current Usage
usage.exceeded_limit: You've exceeded your monthly budget. Purchase extra credits for more sessions.
usage.reached_free_limit: You've reached the free tier limit. Upgrade to Premium for more projects.
usage.monthly_pool_info: Budget is shared across all your projects.
usage.running_low: Running low? Purchase extra credits to keep going.

messages.subscription_active: Your subscription is now active. Enjoy up to 35 projects and translations!
messages.subscription_active_starter: Your subscription is now active. Enjoy up to 5 projects and 2 language translations!
messages.subscription_switched_to_premium: Your subscription has been upgraded from Starter to Premium. Enjoy the enhanced features!
messages.subscription_switched_to_starter: Your subscription has been changed from Premium to Starter.
messages.credits_added: Your credits have been added to your account.
messages.no_charges: Your payment was canceled. No charges were made.
messages.will_end: Your subscription will end at the end of the current billing period.
messages.confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your Premium subscription? You will lose access to translations and the higher project limit at the end of your billing period.
messages.confirm_cancel_starter: Are you sure you want to cancel your Starter subscription? You will lose access to translations and the higher project limit at the end of your billing period.

traffic.title: Daily Traffic
traffic.subtitle: Access trends over time
traffic.no_data: No access data recorded for this period

upgrade_cta.title: Unlock Premium Features

subscription.upgrade_to_create_more: You've created {current} of {limit} projects allowed on your current tier.
subscription.upgrade_prompt: Upgrade to Premium for more projects, translations, and 3,000 monthly access.
subscription.bulk_import_limit: Cannot import {importing} projects. You have {current} of {limit} projects. You can import up to {canCreate} more.
subscription.translation_premium_only: Multi-language translations are only available on the Premium plan.
subscription.upgrade_for_translations: Upgrade to Premium to translate your content into multiple languages.

translation.title: Translations
translation.subtitle: Manage AI-powered translations for your content
translation.sectionSubtitle: Translate your content to reach international visitors
translation.warningFinishContent: Finish preparing all your content first (project details + content items)
translation.warningFreeForPremium: Translations are FREE and unlimited for Premium subscribers
translation.warningQuality: Powered by Google Gemini for high-quality translations
translation.clickButtonToStart: Click "Manage Translations" to translate your content
translation.outdatedTooltip: Content has changed since translation - update recommended
translation.outdatedBoxTooltip: Translations marked as outdated when original content is edited. Re-translate to keep them current.

dialog.title: Translate Content
dialog.limitReached: Language limit reached. Delete an existing translation to add a new one.
dialog.limitReachedDetail: Upgrade to Premium for unlimited languages.
dialog.creditActionDescription: Translate content to {count} selected language(s). Each language translation costs 1 credit and covers all project details and content items.
dialog.selectPopular: Select Popular (中文, 日本語, 한국語)
dialog.manageModeDescription: Select translations to delete. This action cannot be undone.
dialog.manageModeWarning: ⚠️ Deleting translations is permanent and cannot be undone.
dialog.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the {language} translation? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.confirmTranslateMessage: You are about to translate to {count} language(s). This is included with your Premium subscription. Continue?
dialog.reviewBeforeConfirm: Review what will be translated before confirming
dialog.aiNotice: ✨ Using GPT-4.1-nano for high-quality, context-aware translation of museum and cultural content.
dialog.largeContentWarning: ⚠️ Your project has substantial content. Translation may take up to 60 seconds.
dialog.jobCreatedDetail: Your translation is processing in the background. Check the Jobs panel below for real-time progress.
dialog.backgroundInfo: ✨ Translations run in the background. You can safely close this browser or navigate away!
dialog.parallelExecutionMessage: All {count} languages are being translated simultaneously for faster completion!
dialog.availableMessage: Your content is now available in these languages for all visitors!
dialog.failureMessage: Failed to translate {count} language(s). Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Translation
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {language} translation? This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {count} translations ({languages})? This action cannot be undone.
delete.successMessage: The translation has been removed successfully.

success.title: Translation Successful
success.message: Your content has been translated successfully!

jobs.title: Translation Jobs

empty.title: No translation jobs yet
empty.description: Translation jobs will appear here when you start translating your content

jobs.retry_success_detail: The translation job has been queued for retry
jobs.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this translation job? Reserved credits will be refunded.
jobs.cancel_success_detail: Translation job cancelled and credits refunded

digital_access.control_settings_description: Monitor usage and configure session limits to protect your project from unexpected traffic spikes.
digital_access.settings_description: Manage daily limits and monitor session usage for this digital access QR code
digital_access.daily_limit_explanation: Daily limits reset at midnight UTC. When the limit is reached, new visitors see a friendly 'try again tomorrow' message.
digital_access.total_sessions_tooltip: Total number of visitor sessions since this project was created
digital_access.qr_access_explanation: Create and manage QR codes that visitors scan to access your content. Each QR code can have its own daily limit and can be enabled/disabled independently.
digital_access.add_qr_tooltip: Create a new QR code for a different location or use case
digital_access.daily_limit_hint: Protect against unexpected traffic. Resets at midnight.
digital_access.default_daily_limit_hint: Default daily limit applied to new QR codes
digital_access.default_limit_info: This limit applies to new QR codes by default
digital_access.daily_protection_info: Daily limit protects against traffic spikes
digital_access.subscription_billing_desc: Sessions billed to your monthly subscription budget. Manage in subscription settings.
digital_access.settings_save_error: Failed to save digital access settings
digital_access.session_window_description: Visitors can explore your content freely for 30 minutes without being charged for multiple sessions. This provides a better experience and predictable billing.
digital_access.session_window_benefit_1: Same visitor within 30 minutes = no additional charge
digital_access.session_window_benefit_2: Encourages visitors to fully explore your content without worry
digital_access.session_window_benefit_3: Perfect for museum exhibits, restaurant visits, and events
digital_access.qr_code_description: Scan or share this QR code to access your content
digital_access.qr_codes_description: Manage multiple QR codes for this project. Each QR code can have its own settings.
digital_access.qr_name_hint: A name to help you identify this QR code
digital_access.name_required: Please enter a name for this QR code
digital_access.delete_qr_confirm_message: This will permanently delete this QR code. Any printed or shared links will stop working.
digital_access.cannot_delete_last: Cannot delete the last QR code
digital_access.qr_tip_1: Print the QR code on posters, flyers, or signage
digital_access.qr_tip_2: Share the URL directly via email or messaging
digital_access.qr_tip_3: Each scan counts toward your usage limits
digital_access.qr_tip_refresh: Refresh the QR code to invalidate old links if needed
digital_access.access_control_desc: Enable or disable public access to this QR code
digital_access.access_enabled_success: Access enabled - QR code is now active
digital_access.access_disabled_success: Access disabled - QR code is now inactive
digital_access.qr_disabled_warning: This QR code is currently disabled. Visitors will not be able to access your content.
digital_access.refresh_qr_tooltip: Generate a new access link (old links will stop working)
digital_access.refresh_qr_confirm_message: This will generate a new access link. All existing QR codes and shared links will stop working.
digital_access.refresh_qr_warning_1: Old QR codes printed on materials will no longer work
digital_access.refresh_qr_warning_2: You'll need to re-share the new link with your audience
digital_access.token_refreshed: QR code refreshed - new access link generated
digital_access.ai_enabled_status: AI Assistant enabled - sessions billed at AI rate
digital_access.ai_disabled_status: AI Assistant disabled - sessions billed at standard rate

templates.library_description: Browse pre-built templates for different venue types and quickly create new projects.
templates.explore_description: Use these pre-built templates instantly or customize them to create your own projects.
templates.no_templates_description: No templates match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
templates.access_limits_info: This template has access limits configured
templates.import_language_hint: Select the language for your project content. Translations will not be copied.
templates.custom_name_hint: Leave empty to use the template name

admin.management_description: Manage the template library for all users
admin.manage_desc: Create, edit, and organize templates for your users
admin.bulk_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} templates? This action cannot be undone.
admin.no_templates_desc: No templates have been created yet. Use the Import tab to add templates.
admin.no_templates_for_filter: No templates match your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
admin.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
admin.excel_import_description: Upload an Excel file to import multiple templates at once.
admin.import_card_export_description: Upload card export archives (.zip) to add them as templates. Supports single or multiple files.
admin.invalid_card_export_format: Invalid file format. Please upload a ZIP archive exported from FunTell.
admin.name: Name
admin.drag_reorder_disabled_hint: Clear search and filters to reorder templates.
admin.slug_readonly: Slug cannot be changed after creation
admin.drag_to_reorder: Drag rows in the table to change display order
admin.no_content_items: No content items yet. Add items to build your template.
admin.create_template_desc: Create a template by linking one of your existing cards. Users who import this template will get a copy of the card and its content.
admin.select_card_placeholder: Choose a card to use as template...
admin.slug_hint: URL-friendly identifier. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.
admin.edit_card_hint: To edit the card content, name, or AI settings, click the edit card button in the table.
admin.info_description: Templates are linked to your cards. Create cards in My Cards, then link them as templates here. Users who import templates get a full copy of your card and its content.
admin.instruction_hint: 📝 Fill in your project details below. Required fields marked with *. Use dropdowns for validation.
